thread.title: Russian police detain Putin critic Navalny at protest

title: Russian police detain Putin critic Navalny at protest
text:
Russian police detain Putin critic Navalny at protest  24 
Russian police wrestled opposition leader Alexei Navalny into a patrol wagon on Sunday, moments after he appeared at a rally to urge voters to boycott what he said would be a rigged presidential election in March.   
Russian police wrestled opposition leader Alexei Navalny into a patrol wagon on Sunday, moments after he appeared at a rally to urge voters to boycott what he said would be a rigged presidential election in March.  //reut.rs/2nj30ZT
